name: Houlihan Lokey, Inc.
description: Houlihan Lokey, Inc. engages in the provision of investment banking services. It operates through the following segments: Corporate Finance, Financial Restructuring, and Financial Advisory Services. The Corporate Finance segment handles the mergers and acquisitions; and capital markets advisory services. The Financial Restructuring segment manages the advisory services for large and complex restructurings. The Financial Advisory Services segment provides financial opinion and financial and strategic consulting services. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, CA.
